message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product at a price of $1200000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm only able to go up to $1050000 at this time.  This is my best price, and I'm confident the product will be a good investment for me at this price point.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1050000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. I'm now offering the product to you for $1175000. This is my final counteroffer, and I'm confident it's a fair price considering the value you'll get from the product.

Alice,  while I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway, I'm still not quite there.  I can go up to $1100000, but that's my absolute limit.  I'm confident this is a fair price considering the value of the product and the potential for a successful partnership.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $1100000, but I'm still not willing to sell the product at that price. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price of $1200000. I'm now offering the product to you for $1150000. This is my last offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
